video.title: The Super Mario Bros. Super Show!
video.synopsis: Mixing live action and animation, this classic series brought the beloved Super Mario Bros. video game characters to television screens everywhere.

seasons.title: The Super Mario Bros. Super Show!

episodes.synopsis: It's a serious case of mistaken identity when a Giant Birdo thinks Toad is her missing baby and tries to claim him as her own.
episodes.title: The Bird! The Bird!

episodes.synopsis: There's a rumble in the Old West when Koopa the Kid takes the Princess as his prisoner and brands Mario and Luigi as wanted outlaws.
episodes.title: Butch Mario & the Luigi Kid

episodes.synopsis: In a twist on the Camelot legend, Mario frees a golden toilet plunger from an enchanted sink with help from a wizard named Mervin.
episodes.title: King Mario of Cramalot

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi hitch a ride on a magic carpet to stop a determined King Koopa from adding the Princess to his ever-growing harem.
episodes.title: Mario's Magic Carpet

episodes.synopsis: When Captain Koopa takes the Princess prisoner aboard his sidewheeler, Mario and Luigi don disguises as riverboat gamblers to rescue her.
episodes.title: Rolling Down the River

episodes.synopsis: The evil Emperor Augustus Septemberus Octoberus Koopa lures Mario and Luigi into a trap with the promise of a spaghetti dinner benefit.
episodes.title: The Great Gladiator Gig

episodes.synopsis: It's an Italian twist on a classic fairy tale when Mario climbs a stalk grown from magic garbanzo beans and does battle with giant-sized Koopa.
episodes.title: Mario and the Beanstalk

episodes.synopsis: Mario finds himself fending off unwanted advances when the gluttonous Queen of Rotundaland downs a love potion by mistake.
episodes.title: Love 'em and Leave 'em

episodes.synopsis: With Toad's life hanging in the balance, Mario and Luigi enter a BMX bike race that's got Koopa's evil fingerprints all over it.
episodes.title: The Great BMX Race

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi have a tiny problem on their hands when Koopa mistakenly turns the Princess into a baby via the Fountain of Youth.
episodes.title: Two Plumbers and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: When Koopa takes over Planet Quirk and forces the natives into slavery, it's up to Mario and Luigi to set them free.
episodes.title: Stars in Their Eyes

episodes.synopsis: The Princess is in shackles once again when Long John Koopa takes her as his prisoner, forcing Mario and Luigi into a pair of pirate disguises.
episodes.title: Pirates of the Koopa

episodes.synopsis: There's trouble of epic proportions when Koopa turns himself into a half-robot monster -- with a little help from a reluctant Dr. Nerdnick.
episodes.title: Robo Koopa

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi steel themselves for a spooky adventure when Count Koopula makes plans to turn the Princess into a marinara-loving vampire.
episodes.title: Count Koopula

episodes.synopsis: A heated search for Sheldon the Witch Doctor takes Mario, Luigi, Toad and the Princess into the wilds of the Ama-Zone jungle.
episodes.title: Jungle Fever

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi dive beneath the surface in an undersea adventure to help the Mermushrooms free their captured King Neptune from Koopa's clutches.
episodes.title: Mario of the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi come to the aid of the mighty Hercufleas when King Koopa steals his Great Balls of Fire.
episodes.title: The Fire of Hercufleas

episodes.synopsis: After sneaking a bite of Super Sushi, Koopa grows into a towering monster named Koop-zilla and sets out to destroy Sayonara.
episodes.title: Mario Meets Koop-zilla

episodes.synopsis: It's Mario and Luigi to the rescue when Koopa stirs tensions between once-warring families to keep Romero and Joliet from getting married.
episodes.title: Mario and Joliet

episodes.synopsis: Poor Princess Toadstool's in danger again when Koopa kidnaps the Fire God of Lavalava and strong-arms the natives into human sacrifice.
episodes.title: Too Hot to Handle

episodes.synopsis: With Mario and Luigi poised to go back home to Brooklyn, Koopa once again takes the Princess prisoner, forcing them to stay.
episodes.title: Brooklyn Bound

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi are on the case when the evil Professor Koopa-arity takes crime-solver extraordinaire Herlock Sholmes as his own private prisoner.
episodes.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Mario

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi work with the Hooded Robin to look for stolen gold coins in Sharewood Forest and thwart the greedy Sheriff of Koopingham.
episodes.title: Hooded Robin and His Mario Men

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi must help the Mushroom Colonists stay afloat when the evil King Koopa sucks all the spaghetti sauce out of Car Land.
episodes.title: Toad Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Armed with a magic flute that charms the children of Pastaland, evil King Koopa lures kids to his castle. But can Mario and Luigi change his tune?
episodes.title: The Pied Koopa

episodes.synopsis: With Koopa holding the King of Rapland hostage, Mario and Luigi must speak in rhythmic rhyme to set him free.
episodes.title: Bad Rap

episodes.synopsis: It's up to Mario and Luigi to go undercover when Koopa takes out James Blond, the Princess's most important secret agent.
episodes.title: Her Majesty's Sewer Service

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi take to the skies in a flying carpet biplane to bring down Red Baron Koopa and the nefarious sky turtle Lakatu.
episodes.title: Red Baron Koopa

episodes.synopsis: With a little bit of luck and a leprechaun on their side, Mario and Luigi scour Shamrock Land to recover a stolen pot of gold .
episodes.title: Mighty McMario And The Pot Of Gold

episodes.synopsis: Koopa pressures the Princess into marriage by threatening to turn the Marios into stone. But can he be stopped before she's forced to say, "I do"?
episodes.title: Do You Princess Toadstool Take This Koopa?

episodes.synopsis: With El Desertland under attack from Capitan El Koopa, Mario and Luigi slip on masked disguises and become the heroes Zero and Zero Plus One.
episodes.title: Mark Of Zero

episodes.synopsis: No one's safe -- including the Mushroom People -- with Captain Koopa-Nemo patrolling the waters of Oceanworld in his souped-up submarine.
episodes.title: 20,000 Koopas Under The Sea

episodes.synopsis: With Redcoat Koopa's army lurking on the other side of the Delawide, it's up to Mario and Luigi to help General George Washingtoad get cross safely.
episodes.title: The Koopas Are Coming!

episodes.synopsis: Megalomaniacal scientist Dr. Koopenstein sets out to steal Mario and Luigi's brains, with plans to build the ultimate monster.
episodes.title: Koopenstein

episodes.synopsis: It's a prehistoric problem of delicious proportions when Caveman Alley Koopa poisons Mario, and the only way to save him is to bake a pizza.
episodes.title: Quest For Pizza

episodes.synopsis: Crime reigns on the mean streets of Mobsterland, where the evil gangster Al Koopone lords over the quaking residents of the city.
episodes.title: The Unzappables

episodes.synopsis: With the Princess locked away on King Koopa's island fortress, the only way in for Mario and Luigi is via a wooden Trojan Koopa.
episodes.title: The Trojan Koopa

episodes.synopsis: Armed with the ancient art of Plumb-Fu, Mario and Luigi go up against Karate Koopa and his evil squad of Ninja Ninjiis.
episodes.title: Karate Koopa

episodes.synopsis: With Toad and the Princess in tow, Mario and Luigi travel to Sock Hop Land, where they learn that music royalty Elvin Parsley is in trouble.
episodes.title: Elvin Lives

episodes.synopsis: Christmas is in serious trouble when the scroogey Koopa Claus sets out to stop it. But can Mario and Luigi fight back with holiday cheer?
episodes.title: Koopa Claus

episodes.synopsis: Deep among the sands of Desertland, the evil Koop-Tut is holding the Desertlanders hostage with a strict set of rules: the Ten Koopmandments.
episodes.title: The Ten Koopmandments

episodes.synopsis: With help from mushroom Indian scout Pronto, Mario saddles up to thwart Billy the Koopa and free his friends from their Wild West imprisonment.
episodes.title: The Provolone Ranger

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi think they've hit the mother lode ... until Klaimjump Koopa decides to pounce on their gold.
episodes.title: The Great Gold Coin Rush

episodes.synopsis: When Mario gets a foggy head in the thick of the jungle, a pair of caring apes take him under their wing and raise him as "Marzan.
episodes.title: Mario Of The Apes

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi drop in to set the Outback Mushroom People free when Kangaroo Koopa takes over Down Under Land with his squad of evil crocodiles.
episodes.title: Crocodile Mario

episodes.synopsis: The memories come flooding back when Mario and Luigi recount their younger days at the Brooklyn Academy of Plumbing.
episodes.title: Plumber Academy

episodes.synopsis: Mario and Luigi get a taste of what it's like to be tiny when Toad douses them with a potion that shrinks them down to super-small size.
episodes.title: Princess, I Shrunk The Marios

episodes.synopsis: When Mario and Luigi go back to Brooklyn, they learn that Koopa has named the city Kooplyn -- and put himself in charge.
episodes.title: Flatbush Koopa

episodes.synopsis: Indiana Mario heads to Jungleland on an epic quest to find a priceless gold statue known as the Lost Mushroom.
episodes.title: Raiders Of The Lost Mushroom

episodes.synopsis: In a space-based plot a la Star Wars, Mario and Luigi go up against Darth Koopa and end up imprisoned in the Intergalactic Insinkerator.
episodes.title: Star Koopa

episodes.synopsis: No one's ever escaped from Koopa's impenetrable Koopatraz prison ... until Mario, Luigi, Toad and the Princess give it a try.
episodes.title: Escape From Koopatraz

episodes.synopsis: In true big, bad wolf style, Koopa preys on the Princess when the Marios travel to Winterland to visit the Princess's grandmother.
episodes.title: Little Red Riding Princess
